name: Model Mayhem
description: Connect with Model Mayhem members, upload your modeling or photography portfolio, search the latest casting calls, apply to modeling jobs, and see whats new from models and photographers all over the world.  Post photos to your feed that you want to show on your Model Mayhem profile.  Some of our features include:  1. Message your friends 2. View/post casting calls 3. Apply to modeling jobs 4. Discover new artists  Join our community of over 1 million members to get paid for your work.  Follow the work of models and photographers that you admire and aspire to work with. Discover new artists, from new models to agency represented models, commercial photographers, and experienced talent in the modeling industry.
